content: melt the ice mini bag charm chiara bertolani this pattern has been inspired by the strength and humanity shown by all the amazing humans who decide not to look away together we can stand up to tyranny and protect each other use the leftover yarn from your melt the ice hats and donate to ribbing the cause if you can start with a slip knot and chain 7 turn work materials sls 6 into the chains chain 1 turn work *sls into flo chain 1 turn* until your rectangle 8-10g circa red yarn reaches 10cm 4in worsted weight used here join the two short sides of the rectangle with 6 3mm crochet hook slss scissors top of the hat work in the round yarn needle 2 stitch markers round 1 chain 1 and single_crochet 30 along the whole length of the ribbing place bor sm under stitch 1 place the other sm under stitch 16 marking the opposite sides of the round round 2-5 scd 1 single_crochet to 3 stitched before sm abbreviations scd 1 single_crochet 1 scd 1 single_crochet to 3 stitched before bor sm scd 1 single_crochet 1 so you will decrease before & chain chain after each sm 4 stitches decreased per round sls slip_stitch round 6 scd all single_crochet single_crochet flo front loop only finishing bor beginning of round cut the yarn leaving circa 1 meter/yard sew the sm stitch marker top shut with a yarn needle scd single_crochet decrease chain 30 or how long you want to and sls back into the top of the hat secure it on the inside with a knot and cut excess weave ends in enjoy
